sentences: Nana Tanimura (谷村 奈南, Tanimura Nana, born September 10, 1987 in Sapporo), is a Japanese pop singer.
Tanimura was raised mainly in Osaka.
She moved frequently between Osaka and Hawaii between the ages of 3 and 8, after which she also stayed for an extended period of time in Los Angeles.
In her third year of high school, Tanimura caught the attention of music production agents at an event in Osaka.
In 2007, her first singles, "Again" and "Say Good-Bye" were released under Avex Group's Sonic Groove label.
In 2008, Tanimura released the singles "Jungle Dance" and "If I'm Not the One / Sexy Senorita".
